txt.en: 'You are a true friend, [placeholder], and thanks to you, my business is saved! If you'll give me a moment, I'll dig out one of my recipes for you.\n\n'Now, where did I leave it?'

'Here you are, [placeholder]! For your hard work, I've decided to give you one of my pie recipes -- be sure not to use spoiled berries!

'And if you have any stomach left for pies after all the pie-adventures you have now had, I'd like you to have one of them as well!

'Thanks again for your hard work, [placeholder], Pie-runner!'
'Thanks for all your help, [placeholder]! My pies are saved!'
A True Friend of Holly Hornblower
You have run all over the Shire helping to return spoiled pies to Holly Hornblower -- no small feat!
Holly Hornblower is north of the main square of Hobbiton.\n\nHolly has decided to give you one of her pie recipes and is waiting to speak with you.
